title: Charming 2 Bedroom House on Prime Grand Avenue Location **WOOF WOOF**
posting_body: ['This is a single family home with two units.', 'The Unit here for rent is the majority of the home, all of the yard and 1 off street parking space.', 'The other unit is a small upper level apartment with its own separate access and is already rented.', 'Prime location on the corner of Pascal Street South and Grand Avenue.', ' This freshly updated, and painted, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom home has hardwood floors, a lower level family room, new appliances, including private washer and dryer, private fully fenced in yard and 1 off street parking space.', "You can walk to Dunn Brothers Coffee, Colossal Café, Kowalski's and many other restaurants, pubs and shopping along Grand Avenue.", 'The bus stop is across the street.', 'Monthly rent:', '• $1895/month plus utilities (Wifi is included in rent)', '• Security Deposit: $1975', '• $50/adult non-refundable application fee', 'Qualification:', '• Monthly combined income: 2.5 times monthly rent', '• Credit report with no failure to pay bills', '• Good rental history, No criminal record', '• Limited 3 adults.', 'No smoking.', '• August 1st', 'Lease start is available', '• Dog ok, Cat not so much', 'If you meet above qualification, please give a brief description of your party/family for schedule a showing by email.', 'One line emails with little content will not be answered.', 'Thank you', 'Available unit features (1600 finish square foot):', '• Bedroom 1 (main floor): 12 by 11', '• Bedroom 2 (main floor): 11 by 11', '• Living room (main floor): 14 by 12', '• Family room (lower level): 16 by 12', '• Kitchen (main floor): 10 by 9', '• Full bath (main):', 'Front Porch: 18 by 5', 'Remarks:', "This beautiful duplex house is located on the Corner of Grand Avenue and Pascal Street and within 3 blocks of  Macalester College, Dun Brothers Coffee, Kowalski's and Colossal Café..", 'You can walk to numerous shops on Grand Avenue and the bus stop is across the street.', '• 1 mile to high way 35E and 94', '• 1 mile to WILLIAM MITCHELL', '• 1 mile to Concordia College', '• 2.5 miles St. Paul down town and 7 miles to down town Minneapolis.', '• 2.5 mile to Hamline University', '• 5 miles to U of M.', 'Saint Paul', 'Merriam Park', 'Grand Ave', 'Highland Park', 'Macalester']
